name: Freeze-Dry
description: You unleash a freezing cold air that rapidly chills a creature in range. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing 1d12 + MOVE ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen. This move deals super effective damage to water-type creatures. If the targetâ€™s secondary type is resistant to ice damage, this move deals standard damage instead.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
